Regular Events

Saturdays

Tufnell Park Tavern Food Market, Saturdays 11am-3pm.

Last Sunday of the month

Secret garden.

Last Monday of the month

Green drinks at 7pm. Next one on September 24th.

First Monday of the month

Steering group, 7pm

Past events

15 Apr 2013: Film screening: The Coconut Revolution 7pm Upstairs at the Lord Palmerston

13 Apr 2013: Saturday Art Class 13th April Fabelist Art Classes Saturday Art Class 2-4pm

21 Mar 2013: the greener HOME event 3-9pm at the Hamsptead Old Town Hall

18 Mar 2013: PASSIVHAUS Justin Bere on Passivhaus

12 Mar 2013: A festival of art, science, and music inspired by water. Exhibitions, Lectures, Performances by an International Cast of Artists, Scientists and Musicians at the menier Gallery, 12-28th March

10 Mar 2013: Secret Garden Spring dates Put them in your diary!

9 Mar 2013: Tour de Tufnell Park 'Election Special' 2-mile family friendly bike ride

9 Mar 2013: MARKET THIS SATURDAY bike powered music, papers, rides and more

9 Mar 2013: Blue Plaque Launch 10am, leaving Books For Free NW5 for a guided tour of 18 local blue plaques

8 Mar 2013: Fabelist Art Classes Free Art Class 4-5pm for 7-14 year olds at 129, Fortess Road

5 Feb 2013: Climate Change and the Media Communications and awareness event

28 Jan 2013: Knitting Hits Green Drinks Meet neighbours, have a natter, optional knitting too

Transition Tufnell Park (TTP) is part of the Transition Town network and is one of many Transition Towns all over the world, working together to create community, sustainability and a positive future.
